title: Balcony--City Views-- Luxury One Bedroom
posting_body: ['Balcony--City Views-- Luxury One Bedroom', 'Listing ID #: 212977', 'Price: $3,100', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 1.0', 'Bathrooms: 1.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 675 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'New Construction', 'Roof Deck', 'Valet', 'Wheelchair Access', 'WiFi', 'Apartment Amenities', 'Balcony', 'City View', 'Dishwasher', 'Laundry In Unit', 'Luxury building located right on 21st ST where you can soak in the city views from your own private balcony.', 'The kitchen comes equipped with stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and ceasarstone counters opening up to your sun filled living room with hardwood flooring.', 'There is a washer/dryer in each unit for your convenience.', 'The amenities offered in the building are concierge and resident lounge in the lobby, fitness center, storage, media room and rooftop deck to soak in the Manhattan skyline.', 'Close proximity to Costco, ctown supermarket, coffee shops, and public transportation.', 'Contact Sofia at <URL> to schedule your tour.', 'Sofia Aguirre', 'Phone: (718) 685-2775', 'Mobile: (718) 424-0813', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 (718) 685-2775 \xa0 (718) 424-0813 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Sofia Aguirre at (718) 424-0813']
